Contact

I really do like feedback. 'Then, why are there no comments enabled' you ask? Good question. I ruminate on it in this post. Until I take a closer look at Disqus or another extern commentary system (which might be an infinite amount of time away) you're welcome to comment on a post, say hello, affront me or ask any question you like. Knock yourself out:

  • give me a shout on twitter
  • email me
  • Start your own blog (if you don't already have one) at wordpress.com, tumblr or blogger and use it to link to and comment on my posts. Afterwards, you can write posts yourself, but don't have to.
  • Alternatively, you could create your own jekyll-powered blog and host it on github, like they do in this tutorial. It really isn't that hard.
